definitions.body: [[פְּרִי הָאֲרָמָה]] Ge 4:3 (J), fruit of the ground, of produce in gen., so De 7:13 + 9 t. Dt + 3 t.; [[הָאֶרֶץ]] ´[[פ]] Nu 13:20, Nu 13:26, Nu 13:27 (JE) + 5 t., cf. Ez Eze 25:4; fruit of vineyard 2Ki 19:29 = Is 37:30, Zec 8:12, Is 65:21, Ct So 8:11, So 8:12, in fig. Ho 10:11 + 5 t. + Ez Eze 17:14 (but del. LXX Co al.); esp. [[הָעֵץ]] ´[[פ]] Ge 3:2, Ge 3:3, Ge 3:6, Ex 10:15 (all J) + 21 t., also, in fig., Am 2:9, Ho 9:16 + 4 t. + Ez Eze 17:23 (read [[פּאׁרָה]] branches Co al.); of gardens Am 9:14, Je 29:5, Je 29:28, fig. Ct So 4:12, So 4:16; [[עֵץ פְּרִי]] is fruit-tree Ge 1:11, Ps 148:9, cf. Ec 2:5; [[אֶרֶץ פְּרִי]] Ps 107:34; [[פְּרִי תְּבוּאָךְ]] v:Ps 107:37 fruit of (consisting in) a crop; Ps 72:16 is dub.; Che Du interpr. as

= offspring: fruit of womb ([[בֶּטֶן]]) Ge 30:2, De 7:13 + 9 t., cf. La 2:20, Ps 21:11; of cattle ([[בְּהֵמָה]]) De 28:4, De 28:11, De 28:51, De 30:9; of serpent, fig. of power conquering Philistia Is 14:29.

fig. of fruit of actions, i.e. their consequences: good Is 3:10, Ps 58:12; bad Ho 10:13, Pr 1:31, Mic 7:13, of thoughts Je 6:19; of result of removing sin Is 27:9; result of labour (fruit of hands) Pr 31:16, Pr 31:31; product of works of ´[[י]] Ps 104:13, of wisdom Pr 8:19; [[חְדָקָה]] ´[[פ]] Am 6:12, cf. [[חַדִּיק]] ´[[פ]] Pr 11:30 (rd. [[חֶדֶק]] LXX Hi Toy); of doings (i.e. course of life, or character) Je 17:10, Je 21:14, Je 32:19; [[פִי־אִישׁ]] ´[[פ]] i.e. speech Pr 12:14, Pr 13:2, Pr 18:20; fruit of arrogance Is 10:12 is arrogant speech; fruit of tongue Pr 18:21 = consequences of speech.
